1: spyan <mistake>sdar</mistake> 'dug ste 'di <mistake>sad</mistake> <mistake>gsol//khyab</mistake> bdag bdag la sman pa <mistake>dang//bdag</mistake> don <mistake>bdag</mistake> la thugs <mistake>brsi'i</mistake> <mistake>phyir//sgya</mistake> <mistake>'phul</mistake> <mistake>ra</mistake> bas mngon rdzogs <mistake>pa'// byang</mistake> <mistake>cub</mistake> ji ltar bdag <mistake>thob</mistake> <mistake>mjd// nyon</mistake> mongs
2: <mistake>bas</mistake> ni sems <mistake>dkugs</mistake> <mistake>shing//mi</mistake> shes <mistake>'nam</mistake> du bying ba <mistake>yis//sems</mistake> can kun la sman pa <mistake>dang//bla</mistake> med 'bras bu thob <mistake>bya'i</mistake> <mistake>byir//bcom</mistake> ldan ston pa rdzogs sangs <mistake>rgyas//'gro</mistake> ba'i bla ma bshad du
3: <mistake>gsol//dam</mistake> tshig chen po de <mistake>nid</mistake> <mistake>mkhyen//dbang</mistake> po bsam pa rig pa <mistake>mchog bcom</mistake> ldan 'das kyi ye shes <mistake>sku'i/ /gtug</mistake> tor <mistake>tshen</mistake> <mistake>po'i</mistake> tshig gi <mistake>bdag /'jam</mistake> dpal ye shes sems dpa' <mistake>yi//</mistake>
4: ye shes sku ste rang byung <mistake>ba//don</mistake> zab don ni rgya che <mistake>zhis//don</mistake> chen mtshungs <mistake>meng</mistake> rab <mistake>zhe</mistake> <mistake>ba//thog</mistake> ma <mistake>par</mistake> dang mthar <mistake>dge</mistake> <mistake>ba//mtshan</mistake> yang dag par brjod pa <mistake>mchog/das</mistake> <mistake>pa'i</mistake> <mistake>sanges</mistake> rgyas rnams kyis
5: <mistake>gsungs//ma'ongs</mistake> rnams kyang gsung 'gyur <mistake>la//d</mistake> ltar byung <mistake>pa'i</mistake> rdzogs sangs <mistake>rgyas//gang</mistake> yang yang yang gsungs pa <mistake>gang//rgyud</mistake> chen sgyu 'phrul dra <mistake>ba 'dir // rdo</mistake> rje 'chang <mistake>chan</mistake> <mistake>gasang</mistake> sngags <mistake>'cha//</mistake>
6: dbag med rnams kyis dgyes pa <mistake>yis//gang</mistake> <mistake>pa gbang</mistake> <mistake>dag</mistake> rab gsungs <mistake>pa// bdag</mistake> kyang 'di ni gzung bar <mistake>bgyid //bsam</mistake> pa brtan pos nges 'byung <mistake>bar// mgon</mistake> po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun <mistake>gyi//</mistake>
7: gsang 'dzin <mistake>di</mistake> <mistake>lta ra</mistake> bdag 'gyur <mistake>bgyi //nyon</mistake> <mistake>mong</mistake> ma lus bsal ba <mistake>dang//mi</mistake> shes ma lus <mistake>spang</mistake> ba'i <mistake>phyir//sems</mistake> can rnams kyi bsam pa <mistake>yi //khyad</mistake> par ji bzhin rab <mistake>shad</mistake> <mistake>'tshal// gsang</mistake>
8: dbang lag na rdo rje <mistake>yis//de</mistake> bzhin gshegs la de <mistake>skod</mistake> <mistake>du//gsol</mistake> btab thal mo sbyar byas <mistake>te//lus</mistake> btud nas ni <mistake>sbpyan</mistake> sngar <mistake>'dug /gsol</mistake> ba <mistake>'de bas</mistake> pa'i tshigs su bcad <mistake>ba</mistake> bcu drug <mistake>go///</mistake>
